backend/main.mo: Main canister with movie CRUD, user profiles, access control, and storage integration using authorization mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old movie data to new format by adding default creators and initializing user profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file listing frontend components and evidence for implementing auth-based UI restrictions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles of all major frontend components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style theme defining light/dark CSS variables and applying base color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component setting dark theme, rendering effects, layout, movie grid, and add-movie dialog.
frontend/src/components/AddMovieDialog.t: Dialog for adding movies with auth guards, genre/photo inputs, blob uploads, and error normalization.
Synthwave background music controller with autoplay handling and mute toggle.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Retro‑styled footer with neon aesthetic, branding, and VCR‑style text.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the site header with genre selection and an add‑movie button gated by authentication.
frontend/src/components/MovieCard.tsx: Displays a movie card with photo cycling, detail opening, and owner‑restricted delete functionality.
frontend/src/components/MovieDetailDialo: Shows a modal with movie details and swipeable photo navigation supporting keyboard and touch controls.
frontend/src/components/MovieGrid.tsx: Fetches and displays movies in a grid with pagination or genre filtering and opens detailed view dialogs.
frontend/src/components/VHSEffects.tsx: Renders animated VHS‑style visual effects using a canvas and layered retro backgrounds.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity, login, logout, and login status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching, filtering, adding, and deleting movies through the backend actor with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom 80s‑themed color variables and utilities for global app styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts React, sets up React Query, and wraps the app with the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Normalizes backend errors into clearer user‑friendly messages, especially for authorization and authentication cases.
frontend/src/utils/movieOwnership.ts: Utility to check whether the current authenticated user is the creator/owner of a movie.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radii, animations, and utilities using CSS variables for the neon palette.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, feature requirements, authorization issues, and pending requests related to movie ownership and access control.
